title: Lewis Hamilton's title chances boosted by Sebastian Vettel's grid penalty
text: *London, Oct.23 (ANI): Lewis Hamilton received a major boost in pursuit of his third Formula One world championship title after his nearest rival Sebastian... ANI News 54 minutes ago - Sports Lewis Hamilton’s hopes of winning his third Formula One world championship at the US Grand Prix were boosted on Thursday when closest rival Sebastian Vettel... S.China Morning Post 4 hours ago - Sports Also reported by • The Age • MailOnline • Reuters • German driver hit by 10-race grid penalty for US Grand Prix • Hamilton will retain crown if he wins and Vettel fails to come second Lewis Hamilton’s... guardian.co.uk 6 hours ago - Sports Texas storms likely to be Briton's biggest problem after German rival accepts price of fifth engine change of year Telegraph.co.uk 9 hours ago - Sports AUSTIN - Sebastian Vettel's hopes of delaying Lewis Hamilton's title charge at the United States Grand Prix suffered a potentially fatal blow Thursday when his... Bangkok Post 10 hours ago - World Sebastian Vettel's hopes of delaying Lewis Hamilton's title charge at the United States Grand Prix suffered a potentially fatal blow on Thursday when his Ferrari... SuperSport 11 hours ago - Sports Sebastian Vettel is handed a 10-place grid penalty at the US Grand Prix, boosting Lewis Hamilton's world title hopes.
